alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 24 at 12:29PM CDT until April 24 at 12:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Montgomery County in south central Illinois... * Until 1245 PM CDT. * At 1229 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over White Oak, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Montgomery County. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
